title: 2 S74 silks with Paper Ad backs
author: ricktmd

posts.post_title: 2 S74 silks with Paper Ad backs
posts.post_content:
Offered here are 2 S74-1 white silks with ad backs. The Oldring is ExMT and has an Old Mill Back. The Doyle is also nice VGEX and has a slightly tougher and more desirable Turkey Red back . Both have deep Brown Printing
The Oldring is sold 
The Doyle is sold
Please add 5.00 for shipping
If you are interested in S74 silks please check out the silk tribute website at [url]www.S74silk.com[/url]
